pullrequest.title: Choose / swap parent and child links in joint inspector

content.raw:
Context: I inserted a `double_pendulum_with_base`, then swapped the parent and child of the `lower_joint`. It behaves much differently. It would require a little pose math to keep the same joint anchor.

@chapulina said the main use of this feature is for joint creation; editing models wasn't considered that much. So this may not be important, but I wanted to mention it.
content.html:
Context: I inserted a double_pendulum_with_base, then swapped the parent and child of the lower_joint. It behaves much differently. It would require a little pose math to keep the same joint anchor.

@chapulina said the main use of this feature is for joint creation; editing models wasn't considered that much. So this may not be important, but I wanted to mention it.
